body_html:
googletest.gpu_device_name() returns /gpu:0 but self._StripGraph(gd) returns proto that contains /device:GPU:0
There is inconsistency across the tests - both /gpu:0 and /device:GPU:0 are used.
Is there intention to unifie them in the future?
body_text:
googletest.gpu_device_name() returns /gpu:0 but self._StripGraph(gd) returns proto that contains /device:GPU:0
There is inconsistency across the tests - both /gpu:0 and /device:GPU:0 are used.
Is there intention to unifie them in the future?
body:
`googletest.gpu_device_name()` returns _/gpu:0_ but `self._StripGraph(gd)` returns proto that contains _/device:GPU:0_ 
There is inconsistency across the tests - both _/gpu:0_ and _/device:GPU:0_ are used. 
Is there intention to unifie them in the future?
